description: Institutional Capital X Solana RWAs (ft. Nest, Anchorage Digital, Synthesys, Superteam SG) A curated reception bringing together Solana founders and ecosystem partners building toward the next wave of real-world asset (RWA) adoption. Hosted by Nest, Anchorage Digital, Synthesys, and Superteam SG, this curated gathering is designed for thoughtful conversations around building, scaling, and supporting institutional-grade RWA use cases on Solana. This is a curated luncheon focused on high-signal discussions across RWAs, DeFi, payments, and on-chain infrastructure Who should attend Capital allocators interested in RWA opportunities Solana founders & core contributors Ecosystem partners, KOLs, and selected media
